channel.title: Open Development Toolkit is being decommissioned on 18 Sept
channel.description:
The IATI technical team would like to give advance notice that the **[Open Development Toolkit](http://opendevtoolkit.org/)** will be decommissioned on Tuesday 18 September 2018.
The website is being turned off as the content is outdated and no longer relevant to users looking for information about IATI.
Decommissioning the Open Development Toolkit will help avoid confusion for users and divert resources into improving the experience of other IATI online tools and support.
For any questions on the decommissioning of the Open Development Toolkit, please email IATI’s technical team at [support@iatistandard.org](mailto:support@iatistandard.org).
